motions.title: Move Discussion Item #14 to Business Items
motions.description: Motion to amend the agenda to move item #14 (Request for Pre-Construction Funding for Real Time Crime Center) to the last item under Business Items.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of March 25, 2024 meeting minutes, technology department position conversions, employee compensation chart amendment and market adjustment, managed networking service agreement, and storm repairs funding.

motions.title: Parks and Recreation Sign Package Contract Award
motions.description: Award contract to Signarama Roswell for Parks and Recreation sign package in amount of $138,200 including 10% contingency.

motions.title: North Shallowford Annex Maintenance Repairs Contract Award
motions.description: Award contract to Southern Preservation Systems for North Shallowford Annex maintenance repairs in amount of $198,800 including 10% contingency.

motions.title: Real Time Crime Center Pre-Construction Funding
motions.description: Approval of pre-construction funding for Real Time Crime Center modifications in amount of $53,670.69 funded with SPLOST funds.
